verbs.description: Trump 's North Korea summit , like his G7 performance and attack on Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau , [V: will] be a huge and glorious success — if you 're a Trump supporter .

Trump 's North Korea summit , like his G7 performance and attack on Canadian Prime Minister Justin Trudeau , will be a huge and glorious success — if [ARG1: you] [V: 're] [ARG2: a Trump supporter] .
